qolmat.utils.utils.construct_graph

qolmat.utils.utils.construct_graph(X: numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.typing._generic_alias.ScalarType]], n_neighbors: Optional[int] = 10, distance: Optional[str] = 'euclidean', n_jobs: Optional[int] = 1) → numpy.ndarray[source]

Construct a graph based on the distance (similarity) between data

Parameters
Xnp.ndarray

Observations

n_neighborsint, optional

Number of neighbors for each node, by default 10

distancestr, optional

Method to construct the weight of the links, by default ‘euclidean’

n_jobsint, optional

Number of jobs to run in parallel, by default 1

Returns
np.ndarray

Graph’s adjacency matrix
